attributes.action: scrap the current logo for the 2012 Olympics and demand a refund for the full £400,000.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new logo for the Olympics in 2012 is not only hard on the eyes but cost a staggering £400,000. The BBC held a logo competition and recieved at least five logos which were above the par of the chosen one.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
